fields.summary: iOS: Custom Label in Button stays in highlightedColor state once button is released.

comments.body: Tested and confirmed the Kitchen Sink issue on iOS 5.1 Ti SDK 2.1.3 GA, 2.1.4 GA and latest 3.0.0 CI. Description mentions a change in iOS 6, but this happens on iOS 5.1 too...
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
